ProductInfo.Features:
20.2 MP Full-Frame CMOS Sensor DSLR and EF24-105mm f4L IS USM Lens
11 Point AF points, 63-zone Dual-Level Metering Sensor - Built-in GPS Receiver and Wi-Fi Transmitter
Canon iMAGE GATEWAY to Share and Upload Photos Anyhwere on iOS or Android Devices with Free EOS Remote Application
Memory Cards: SD/SDHS/SDXC, and Ultra High-Speed (UHS-I) cards (64GB Included)
Kit Includes: Canon EOS 6D Body and 24-105mm Lens and Original Canon Supplied accessories, + Battery Grip for the Canon 6D, + Transcend 64 GB Class 10 SDXC Card, + Card Reader, + Memory Card Wallet, + Spare LP-E6 Battery, + Screen Protector, + Digital Camera 6-piece Cleaning Kit
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 6D SLR Digital Camera with Canon 24-105mm f/4.0L IS USM AF Lens + Battery Grip + 64 GB Master Kit.
